EmailTemplate.description: Thank you letter for registering to attend the IN PDS - Oct 2007
EmailTemplate.name: Partnership Dialogue Series - IN - Thank you for Registering - Oct 2007
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation to attend ASA's Partnership Dialogue Series!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering to attend ASAâ€™s Partnership Dialogue Series: A Focus on Communication.
Date: Thursday, October 18, 2007 Start Time: 8:30 am Location: Manchester College Laham Room, Union Building 604 East College Ave North Manchester, IN 46962 http://www.manchester.edu/Common/VisitingManchester/directions.htm
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your registration please email training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099.
We look forward to seeing you!
